sites.title: Wikipedia
sites.description: The free encyclopedia that anyone can edit. A vast repository of human knowledge covering millions of topics in hundreds of languages.

sites.title: GitHub
sites.description: The world's leading platform for software development and version control. Where developers collaborate, share code, and build amazing things together.

sites.title: MDN Web Docs
sites.description: Comprehensive web development documentation and learning resources. Your go-to reference for HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and web APIs.

sites.title: Stack Overflow
sites.description: The largest online community for programmers to learn, share knowledge, and build their careers. Get answers to your coding questions.
